newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai car sales up 9.2 pct in January-Toyota.
newsitem.headline: Thai car sales up 9.2 pct in January-Toyota.

text.p: Sales of passenger cars and commercial vehicles in Thailand rose 9.2 percent to 42,975 units in January from 39,369 a year ago, Toyota Motors (Thailand) said on Monday.
Toyota said Thai pick-up truck sale rose 20 percent to 26,278 units last month from 21,898 in the same period a year ago, while sale of passenger cars eased 1.8 percent to 11,103 units from 11,308.
Toyota remained the biggest auto company commanding a 24.3 percent market share with a monthly sale of 10,435 in January against 9,363 a year ago, it said.
Isuzu Motors Ltd came second with 9,411 of its vehicles sold last month, accounting for a 21.9 percent market share against 8,619 a year ago.
